name: unrewarded
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If someone is unrewarded, they do not get anything in exchange for something they have done: go unrewarded Your hard work won't go unrewarded. There are a lot of people whose actions go unrewarded and unrecognized. Related word
reward
More examplesFewer examplesThe managers' goal is to eliminate unrewarded risks.Unfortunately, nobody was home and we left unrewarded for our effort.The home team were unlucky to go unrewarded in the first half.Like parents everywhere, I felt that every effort went unnoticed and unrewarded.
